sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Nav, NavLogo, BodyContainer, Library, Song, SongInfo, ControlPanel, FontAwesome, SongName, AuthorName, ImgDiv, Slider, Buttons, Track, AnimateTrack, InputRange, SongCurrentTime, SongFullTime, FontAwesomeControl, ToggleButton, BgFilter, ButtonGroup, LibrarySongDiv, LibrarySongDesc, LibrarySongName, LibrarySongAuthorName, LibraryImgDiv } from './MusicPlayerFullElements.js' import { faPause, faPlay, faTimes, faVolumeUp, faChevronRight, faChevronLeft, faUndo, faToggleOff, faToggleOn, faCompressAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { setSongs, setCurrentSong } from "../../redux/reducers/songReducer"; import { setSound, setIsPlaying, setLibraryStatus, setSongPlayingInfo } from "../../redux/reducers/playerControlReducer" const MusicPlayerFull = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [animationPercentage, setAnimationPercentage] = useState(50) const libraryStatus = useSelector((store) => store.playerControl.libraryStatus) const isPlaying = useSelector((store) => store.playerControl.isPlaying) const songs = useSelector((store) => store.song.songs) return ( <>
Indielog dispatch(setLibraryStatus(!libraryStatus))}/>
{songs.map(song => { return ( {song.name} {song.artist} ) })} SuckDIDI SUCKDIDILONG 0:00 3:00 ) } export default MusicPlayerFull
